newsitem.title: USA: Morris Alper, Mid Atlantic form partnership.
newsitem.headline: Morris Alper, Mid Atlantic form partnership.

text.p: Three brokerage firms specializing in food and consumer products said on Friday they will be joining together to form a new entity: MAI Companies.
The firm will be owned and operated by Morris Alper Inc, Mid Atlantic Marketing and Sales-Chaimson and Mid Atlantic Marketing and Sales-Weaver.
The three entities, combining $2.5 billion in sales, will continue to serve customers and manufacturers in their existing territories, while expanding into the metropolitan New York market.
The new entity will be in operation by October 1.
